DOC.brief_summary: Three group patient go minor surgery general anesthesia inhale anesthetic different ventilatory setting ( Tidal volume : 8 , 10 , 12 ml/kg , respiratory rate : 10/min ) . Group A ( Sevoflurane ) use sevoflurane , group B ( Desflurane ) use desflurane , group C ( Isoflurane ) use isoflurane . It observe difference among group ventilatory effect speed induction . Duration randomise control trial 3 month . Estimated sample size 36 patient ( 12 group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Ventilatory Effect Speed Anesthesia Under Various Inhaled Anesthetics
DOC.detailed_description: No premedicant give . The anesthetic workstation circulatory circuit prefilled 1.0 MAC inhale anesthetic select randomly . - Group A ( n=12 ) : Sevoflurane 2.0 vol % - Group B ( n=12 ) : Desflurane 6.0 vol % - Group C ( n=12 ) : Isoflurane 1.2 vol % Each group 3 subgroup accord ventilatory setting also randomly determine . - Hypoventilation : tidal volume 8 ml/kg , respiratory rate 10 /min - Normoventilation : tidal volume 10 ml/kg , respiratory rate 10 /min - Hyperventilation : tidal volume 12 ml/kg , respiratory rate 10 /min Patients preoxygenated 100 % oxygen ( 5 L/min ) 5 minute pulse oximeter , EKG , noninvasive blood pressure monitoring . Bispectral index ( BIS ) monitor apply . The induction general anesthesia start propofol ( 2 mg/kg ) , rocuronium ( 0.8 mg/kg ) remifentanil infusion ( 0.1 mcg/kg/min ) . The size tracheal tube 7.5 mm ( ID ) male , 7.0 mm ( ID ) female . After intubation , anesthesia workstation connect tracheal tube . Ventilation start , point time 0 . During 720 second , inspiratory ( PIgas ) end-tidal concentration inhale anesthetic ( ETgas ) , end-tidal partial pressure carbon dioxide , BIS measure time 0 , 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 ,150 , 180 , 240 , 300 , 360 , 480 , 600 , 720 second . Mean blood pressure heart rate also record every 2 minute . Fresh gas flow keep 6 L/min 100 % oxygen . The fraction ETgas/PIgas analyze nonlinear mixed effect model . Estimated sample size 36 patient ( 12 group , 4 ventilatory setting ) .
DOC.criteria: ASA PS I , II Age : 2060 year male female Elective schedule minor surgery BMI < 30 Patients pulmonary , cardiac , endocrinal , neuromuscular neurological disease past history Upper airway anomaly deformity ASA PS III higher Pregnant woman BMI > = 30
